poemsDataJson.list_full: 天(あま)つ風(かぜ) 雲(くも)の通(かよ)ひ路(ぢ) 吹(ふ)き閉(と)ぢよ をとめの姿(すがた) しばしとどめむ
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Let the winds of heaven//Blow through the paths among the clouds//And close their gates.//Then for a while I could detain//These messengers in maiden form.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Ama tsu kaze|Kumo no kayoi-ji|Fuki tojiyo|Otome no sugata|Shibashi todomen
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: をとめのすかた しはしととめむ
poemsDataJson.author: 僧正遍昭(そうじょうへんじょう)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 五節の舞姫の美しさに魅せられ、これを賛美する心
